body.p: The IASB also noted that one of the major concerns that respondents had raised about the reference in the 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft to ‘unbiased result’ was that it could be perceived as requiring entities to identify the ‘perfect’ hedging instrument or that the entity’s commercial decision of which hedging instrument to actually use could be restricted or second guessed (see paragraph BC6.242).
